snippet.title: Skippy the Bot - Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Play it on your browser here: https://doctorm64.itch.io/skippybot
Skippy the Bot is a physics platformer, set in a dangerous abandoned factory. Learn how to hop like a real robot, escape the deadly factory and discover your true destiny.
Made for the 5th anniversary of AM2R being released, and Metroid's 35th.

Thanks to the awesome AM2R community for providing widescreen footage for the trailer.
Anniversary blog post:
https://metroid2remake.blogspot.com/2021/08/happy-35th-birthday-samus.html
